quote: The barrier during self-improvement is not so much that we hate learning, rather we hate being taught. To learn entails that the knowledge was achieved on one's own accord - it feels great - but to be taught often leaves a feeling of inferiority. Thus it takes a bit of determination and a lot of humility in order for one to fully develop.
author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy

quote: Nothing makes a person desire improvement like failure
author: Christopher Stocking

quote: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: I have a great respect for incremental improvement, and I've done that sort of thing in my life, but I've always been attracted to the more revolutionary changes. I don't know why. Because they're harder. They're much more stressful emotionally. And you usually go through a period where everybody tells you that you've completely failed.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Persistence, perseverance, and continuous improvement are the ingredients for forming a successful person.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If you wish to achieve worthwhile things in your personal and career life, you must become a worthwhile person in your own self-development.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Buy or borrow self-improvement books, but don't read them. Stack them around your bedroom and use them as places to rest bowls of cookies.Watch exercise shows on television, but don't do the exercises. Practice believing that the benefit lies in imagining yourself doing the exercises.Don't power walk. Saunter slowly in the sun, eating chocolate, and carry a blanket so you can take a nap.
author: SARK

quote: When you are living the best version of yourself, you inspire others to live the best versions of themselves.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: You look at yourself and you accept yourself for who you are, and once you accept yourself for who you are you become a better person.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: One important key to success is self-confidence. An important key to self-confidence is preparation.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: You are doing the best you can, and that best results in good to yourself and to others. Do not nag yourself with a sense of failure. Get on your knees and ask for the blessings of the Lord;then stand on your feet and do what you are asked to do.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: Focus on making yourself better, not on thinking that you are better.
author: Bohdi Sanders,  The Secrets of Worldly Wisdom: Your Key to Unlocking Success

quote: Success is the progressive realization of predetermined, worthwhile, personal goals.
author: Paul J. Meyer

quote: Everybody talks about wanting to change things and help and fix, but ultimately all you can do is fix yourself. And that's a lot. Because if you can fix yourself, it has a ripple effect.
author: Rob Reiner

quote: No matter who you are, no matter what you did, no matter where you've come from, you can always change, become a better version of yourself.
author: Madonna

quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Self-Motivation [10w] "Today I'll do something more extraordinarythan I did yesterday.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: You'll never reach perfection because there's always room for improvement. Yet get along the way to perfection, you'll learn to get better.
author: Hlovate,  Versus

quote: Success to me is being a good person, treating people well.
author: David LaChapelle

quote: ‎Determination, effort, and practice are rewarded with success.
author: Mary Lydon Simonsen,  The Perfect Bride for Mr. Darcy

quote: Success is steady progress toward one's personal goals.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: You become better not by competing with someone else but by improving your awareness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Success in any endeavor depends on the degree to which it is an expression of your true self.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: Success is peace of mind which is a direct result of self-satisfaction in knowing you did your best to become the best you are capable of becoming.
author: John Wooden

quote: Never mind what others do; do better than yourself, beat your own record from day to day, and you are a success.
author: William J. H. Boetcker

quote: One measure of your success will be the degree to which you build up others who work with you. While building up others, you will build up yourself.
author: James E. Casey

quote: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.
author: Shiv Khera

quote: Every day, and in every way, I am becoming better and better.
author: Émile Coué

quote: I went to a bookstore and asked the saleswoman, 'Where's the self-help section?' She said if she told me, it would defeat the purpose.
author: George Carlin

quote: I've been surrounded by a lot of people who felt that external success would result in them feeling good about themselves. But it just seems extremely unfulfilling to me.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: The secret of success is learning how to use pain and pleasure instead of having pain and pleasure use you. If you do that, you're in control of your life. If you don't, life controls you.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Success is peace of mind, which is a direct result of self-satisfaction in knowing you made the effort to become the best of which you are capable.
author: John Wooden

quote: LearningTo believe you are magnificent. And gradually to discover that you are not magnificent. Enough labor for one human life.
author: Czesław Miłosz

quote: When I'm good, I'm very good, but when I'm bad, I'm better.
author: Mae West

quote: I always think part of success is being able to replicate results, taking what is interesting or viable about yourself as a professional person and seeing if you bring it into different situations with similar results.
author: Robert Downey, Jr.

quote: Accepting oneself does not preclude an attempt to become better.
author: Flannery O'Connor

quote: Self-education is the greatest self-liberation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I have found no greater satisfaction than achieving success through honest dealing and strict adherence to the view that, for you to gain, those you deal with should gain as well.
author: Alan Greenspan

quote: When we're connected to others, we become better people.
author: Randy Pausch,  The Last Lecture

quote: Success is doing ordinary things extraordinarily well.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: You learn a lot about yourself when you have success for a while. Like, a lot of things that you think are really important aren't. But you need that process.
author: Curtis Jackson

quote: If we have learned nothing else from the 20th century, we should at least have grasped that the more perfect the answer, the more terrifying its consequences. Incremental improvements upon unsatisfactory circumstances are the best that we can hope for, and probably all we should seek.
author: Tony Judt

quote: Success is measured by your discipline and inner peace.
author: Mike Ditka

quote: Self education is the key to self liberation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Don't bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself.
author: William Faulkner

quote: If I am not good to myself, how can I expect anyone else to be good to me?
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I do not think that there is any other quality so essential to success of any kind as the quality of perseverance. It overcomes almost everything, even nature.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: To be the best, you have to be willing to do what nobody does. And today, if nobody reads and nobody works hard, then you also have to give up reading and become lethargic to be successful.
author: Jarod Kintz,  Who Moved My Choose?: An Amazing Way to Deal With Change by Deciding to Let Indecision Into Your Life

quote: Erase self-doubt by working to build your strengths instead of focusing on your weaknesses.
author: Rodolfo Costa,  Advice My Parents Gave Me: and Other Lessons I Learned from My Mistakes

quote: Success is about enjoying what you have and where you are, while pursuing achievable goals.
author: Bo Bennett
